Game: QWERTY Warriors 2

08 Oct 2011

[caption id="attachment_4971" align="aligncenter" width="549" caption="QWERTY Warriors 2"][/caption] Go to the Game: QWERTY Warriors 2 on Kongregate Task: Survive as long as possible. How to play: You have to type the enemy-words as fast as possible. Your figure will automatically shoot at them when you type.
